title: Blackadder the third. - [Vol. 2].
brief_description: With anarchists lurking, Blackadder suggests Prince George make a sympathetic speech towards the proletariat. They hire two actors to help with public speaking, until Baldrick uncovers what appears to be a plot to murder the Prince. It is really a combination of “Sense and Senility” as Blackadder tries to win the day. Broke as usual, Prince George must supplement his income by marrying a wealthy woman. In “Amy and amiability” he tries to do just that, however it is Blackadder’s attempt at becoming a highwayman which reaps monetry rewards. When Prince George is not engaged in illicit liasons with the Duke of Wellington’s neices, he is being challenged to a duel by the same gentleman. Blackadder, taking advantage of his look-alike cousin McAdder, “the most dangerous man to wear a skirt in Europe”, offers to take the Prince’s place.
